options.label: Automatic: Result is computed by the Formula Applet
Manual: You have to specify a result

semantics.label: Expression (LATEX)
semantics.description: Use this field only if you are familiar with LATEX

semantics.label: Physics Mode
semantics.description:
Check if result is a physical quantity (value and unit).
Uncheck if result is a mathematical expression.

semantics.label: Formula Applet Id
semantics.description: Id of the Formula Applet - has to be unique
